item.title: About Me ðŸ‘‹
item.description: class Me: def __init__(self, name): self.name = "Kunyang Xie" self.prefer_name = "Kyrie" self.born_year = 1999 self.height = 181 self.hometown = "Weifang, Shandong, CN" self.grad_school = "uWaterloo" self.undergrad_school = "UESTC, UofG" self.curr_location = "Waterloo, ON, CA" def favs(self): self.fav_sport = "cycling, basketball" self.fav_series = "Better Call Saul" self.fav_color = "Macaroon Colors" self.fav_band = "the Chainsmokers" self.
